scripts.dev: yarn link pegs && yarn link ion2boot && yarn install && mkdir -p lib
scripts.watchAst: nodemon -w ionsrc -e ion -x ion2boot src/ast ionsrc
scripts.watchBuild: nodemon --ignore test/lib -w src/parser.pegs -x pegs src/parser.pegs lib/parser.js & tsc -p . --watch
scripts.watchTest: nodemon --ignore test/lib -w lib -w test -e js,ion lib/command.js test/lib test/src
scripts.watchDebug: nodemon --ignore test/lib -w lib -w test -e js,ion --inspect-brk lib/command.js test/lib test/src
